pma:database.name: TravelAgency
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `users` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `identifiant` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `password` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `admin` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
